00037 canonLine::canonLine(std::string canonL, machineStatus prevStatus): status(prevStatus), myUnSolid(), myLine(canonL) {
00038   //myUnSolid.Nullify();
00039   tokenize(); //splits myLine using delimiters
00040 }

00043 int canonLine::getN() {
00044   if ( (canonTokens[1].c_str()[1] == '.') && (canonTokens[1].c_str()[2] == '.') )
00045     return -1;
00046   else
00047     return tok2i(1,1);
00048 }
00049 
00051 int canonLine::getLineNum() {
00052   return tok2i(0);
00053 }
00054 
00056 const machineStatus* canonLine::getStatus() {
00057   return &status;
00058 }

00071 double canonLine::tok2d(uint n) {
00072   char * end;
00073   double d = strtod( canonTokens[n].c_str(), &end );
00074   assert ( *end == 0 );
00075   return d;
00076 }
00077 
00083 inline int canonLine::tok2i(uint n,uint offset) {
00084   char * end;
00085   int i = strtol( &canonTokens[n].c_str()[offset], &end, 10 );
00086   assert ( *end == 0 );
00087   return i;
00088 }
00089 
00090 const std::string canonLine::getCanonicalCommand() {
00091   return canonTokens[2];
00092 }
00093 
00094 //from http://oopweb.com/CPP/Documents/CPPHOWTO/Volume/C++Programming-HOWTO-7.html
00095 //0 is canon line
00096 //1 is gcode Nnnnnn line
00097 //2 is canonical command
00104 void canonLine::tokenize(std::string str,
00105                          std::vector<std::string>& tokenV,
00106                          const std::string& delimiters) {
00107   // Skip delimiters at beginning.
00108   std::string::size_type lastPos = str.find_first_not_of(delimiters, 0);
00109   // Find first "non-delimiter".
00110   std::string::size_type pos     = str.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
00111 
00112   while (std::string::npos != pos || std::string::npos != lastPos)
00113   {
00114     // Found a token, add it to the vector.
00115     tokenV.push_back(str.substr(lastPos, pos - lastPos));
00116     // Skip delimiters.  Note the "not_of"
00117     lastPos = str.find_first_not_of(delimiters, pos);
00118     // Find next "non-delimiter"
00119     pos = str.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
00120   }
00121 }
00122 
00125 inline void canonLine::tokenize() {
00126   tokenize(myLine,canonTokens);
00127 }
00128 
00134 canonLine * canonLine::canonLineFactory (std::string l, machineStatus s) {
00135   //check if canonical command is motion or something else
00136   //motion commands: STRAIGHT_TRAVERSE STRAIGHT_FEED ARC_FEED
00137   size_t lin,af,cmnt,msg;
00138   cmnt=l.find("COMMENT");
00139   msg=l.find("MESSAGE");
00140   lin=l.find("STRAIGHT_");
00141   af=l.find("ARC_FEED");
00142   /*
00143   ** check for comments first because it is not impossible
00144   ** for one to contain the text "LINEAR_" or "ARC_FEED"
00145   */
00146   if ( (cmnt!=std::string::npos) || (msg!=std::string::npos) ) {
00147     return new canonMotionless(l,s);
00148   } else if (lin!=std::string::npos) { //linear traverse or linear feed
00149     return new linearMotion(l,s);
00150   } else if (af!=std::string::npos) { //arc feed
00151     return new helicalMotion(l,s); //arc or helix
00152   } else { //canonical command is not a motion command
00153     return new canonMotionless(l,s);
00154   }
00155 }
